answers.answer: I'm not sure that it'll matter what you eat tomorrow.  The test will show how your body processes the glucose so I can't see your body processing it any better bc you ate well one day. That being said, I too tried to eat better the day b4. Just gave me a feeling of control I guess.
Ohhh hmm I eat good everyday but I thought maybe if I didn't have sugar at all it would help lol.
Have you been feeling any diabetic symptoms?
Nope! I didn't necessarily fail the 1 hour. The results got all mixed up so they are having me do the 3 hour in case.

question: So I'm gonna go for the 3 hour test on Tuesday. I'm thinking tomorrow I won't eat any sugar at all just healthy things. I'm so worried I'm going to fail :( the last thing I want is gestational diabetes. My pregnancy has been good so far no problems.
title: 3 hour glucose test.
